comment.author: 8256808@N02
comment._content: If you go to the LOC website, you can get a hi-res version of the pic that allows a closer look at some of the details otherwise invisible on Flickr. There's a street sign that clearly places this at Columbus Circle and Eighth Avenue in Manhattan. There's also a Child's Restaurant (a pioneering chain restaurant) and a Cadillac showroom.

comment._content: here is a link to Google Maps, you can use street view to see what it looks like today. www.google.com/maps?f=q&hl=en&geocode=&q=colu...
